thread.title: Aussie sentenced to death in Thailand
thread.title_full: Aussie sentenced to death in Thailand

title: Aussie sentenced to death in Thailand
text:
Antonio Bagnato sentenced to death over abduction and murder in Thailand February 7, 2017 4:23pm Antonio Bagnato was sentenced to death. Picture: Facebook AAP Share on Twitter 
A MAN has been sentenced to death in Thailand. 
Antonio Bagnato has been found guilty for his role in the 2015 abduction and murder of Hells Angels gang member Wayne Schneider. Wayne Schneider's body was found in Thailand. Source: Supplied 
The judge, at the Pattaya criminal court, read the verdict on Tuesday to a packed courtroom. 
Bagnato, who appeared before the court in prison clothes and leg irons, had pleaded not guilty to the November 2015 abduction and murder of Schneider at a luxury villa apartment at Pattaya, 150 kilometres from Bangkok. Thai police alleged Bagnato was the mastermind behind the abduction and killing of Schneider. Antonio Bagnato was found guilty of being involved in abduction and murder. Picture: Facebook Source: Facebook Antonio Bagnato also goes by the name “Tony Bang”. Picture: Facebook Source: Facebook 
Schneider’s naked body was found in a shallow sandy grave in Sattahip province in Chonburi, 30 kilometres from the villa. 
Thai police said conflicts over a multi-million dollar drug network extending from Europe to Asia lay behind the killing. 
Reports said two security guards at the $5200-a-month villa complex had told Thai police Schneider’s abductors were wearing scarfs over their faces but they believed they were all foreigners. Police search for Wayne Schneider’s body in two-metre deep grave. Picture: Thai PBS English Source: Supplied 
But the guards told Thai police they were able to identify one of the men as Bagnato, who was frequently seen at the residence. 
Thai police had three other suspects in the murder, including two Australians, that had fled Thailand soon after the murder. 
Bagnatio was Schneider’s former body guard and business associate.
